title: MTG DoTP 2014 custom mod V7 48 decks
description:
This is a collection of 48 custom mod decks for MTG DoTP 2014

for more info please visit http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=109&t=10914

Just copy the folder content in the MTG DoTP 2014 installation folder.


You need also to copy d3dx9_43.dll in the installation folder in order that the modded decks will show up in the game, if you already have it then dont overwrite it, but if you don't then proceed so.	

Have Fun!!!
